duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality representation of employers, insurers, and third-party administrators in the defense of workers' compensation claims.
Conduct legal research and analysis to support defense strategies.
Negotiate settlements and communicate with clients, opposing counsel, and the Workers' Compensation Appeals Board.
Manage and prioritize multiple cases in a fast-paced environment.
Mentor junior attorneys and legal assistants, fostering a collaborative team environment.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctorate (JD) degree from an accredited law school
Active and in good standing with the California Bar Association
